question.xref: DES s6, HC p102, KYTS p90
question.text: On a motorway this sign means

explanation.text: It is important to know and obey temporary signs on the motorway: they are there for a reason. You may not be able to see the hazard straight away, as the signs give warnings well in advance, due to the speed of traffic on the motorway.

answer.text: move over onto the hard shoulder
leave the motorway at the next exit
move to the lane on your left
